snippet: The debate, events in the Middle East and the better-than-expected jobs numbers on Friday are forcing the two campaigns to adjust to a new reality in the final month before Election Day.
abstract: The debate, events in the Middle East and the better-than-expected jobs numbers on Friday are forcing the two campaigns to adjust to a new reality in the final month before Election Day.

headline.main: For Both Campaigns, Time to Fine-Tune Their Messages
headline.print_headline: For Both Campaigns, Time to Fine-Tune Their Messages
